div.h5:
You will soon have to solve some tasks on the computer. There are, for example, tasks where you have to:
• Design rooms
• Build figures with blocks
• Participate in a brainstorm
• Draw a route on a map
• Make a schedule
div.h6:
You have to try every one of these types of tasks with the class. Your teacher will walk you through the tasks. When you have been through the five tasks, you can start the real tasks.
Click on at the bottom right, when your teacher tells you to.
